my-component works!

Mayor de Edad

Menor de Edad

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-my-component', templateUrl: './my-component.component.html', styleUrls: ['./my-component.component.css'] }) export class MyComponentComponent { edad:number; constructor(){ this.edad = 18; } ngOnInit():void{ alert('My Component Cargado') } }
